thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: MARK Sangster

author: MARK Sangster
title: MARK Sangster
text: Rented a car from Easirent and they really do what they say and at a really great price. Got a vehicle upgrade on collection which was a pleasant surprise. Originally rented for three days for a business trip, once I arrived at my destination I had to extend the rental by another three days. This was done very easily over the phone and the extra rental was even cheaper than the original rental price. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Easirent to friends and family.
